plot: Tel Aviv teenager Daniella keeps singing "The Man I Love" to herself, until the day she meets Michal, a 32-year-old sculptress. A love affair ensues.
title: It's That Age
plot_es: Tel Aviv teenager Daniella keeps singing "The Man I Love" to herself, until the day she meets Michal, a 32-year-old sculptress. A love affair ensues.
plot_en: Tel Aviv teenager Daniella keeps singing "The Man I Love" to herself, until the day she meets Michal, a 32-year-old sculptress. A love affair ensues.
